folder_naming.details: 40 folders with consistent kebab-case naming convention (agents, api, architecture, cfn-loop, ci-cd, etc.)
issues: phase4-ux uses number prefix (inconsistent with other phase folders)
.claude and .claude-flow hidden folders in docs/ (should be in project root)

duplicate_filenames.details: Only 1 duplicate filename found: README.md appears 13 times (expected for folder indexes)
duplicate_filenames.concern: README.md duplication is intentional and appropriate for folder navigation

coverage_gaps.note: All major categories covered: api, architecture, development, operations, testing, security, guides, etc.

findings.issue: Sample check shows links in guides/README.md reference operations/DEPLOYMENT.md which exists - links appear valid
findings.sample_verified: 5 links verified in guides/README.md pointing to user/, operations/, development/, architecture/, api/ folders
findings.recommendation: Run full link validation with markdown-validator tool in CI

findings.issue: 3 non-markdown files in docs root directory should be relocated
files: agent-token-analysis.js (should be in tools/ or scripts/)
agent-token-analysis-results.json (should be in results/ or artifacts/)

findings.issue: Hidden configuration folders (.claude, .claude-flow) located in docs/ instead of project root
findings.recommendation: Move to project root or document rationale for docs/ location

files_analysis.assessment: Archive candidate - implementation summary, not reference docs
Archive candidate - guide for specific implementation phase
Archive candidate - implementation detail for fallback mechanism

files_analysis.action: DELETE - backups should not be in archive
Consider retention if phase summaries are needed for project history

findings.recommendation: Delete 2 backup files (.backup-* pattern), retain others as historical reference

recommendations.action: Move non-markdown files from docs root
recommendations.details: Relocate agent-token-analysis.js and agent-token-analysis-results.json to appropriate directories (tools/, results/)
Evaluate if .claude and .claude-flow should remain in docs/ or move to project root
Rename phase4-ux to phases/phase-4-ux or align with existing phases/ structure

recommendations.action: Implement automated link checking in CI
recommendations.details: Add markdown-validator.js to pre-commit hooks or CI pipeline to prevent broken links

conditions: Relocate 2 non-markdown files from docs root
Document rationale for .claude folders in docs/ or relocate to project root

strengths: Excellent folder organization with 40 logical categories
Consistent kebab-case naming convention across folders
Complete coverage of all major documentation categories
Appropriate archive folder with relevant candidates (5 files)
weaknesses: Backup files present in both docs root and archive (should be deleted)
Non-markdown files in docs root (JS/JSON analysis files)
Hidden configuration folders in docs/ instead of project root
No automated link validation in place
summary.overall_quality: High quality reorganization with minor cleanup needed before final approval
